resources.string: There are no fees charged when withdrawing funds from your account.\n
Once the withdrawal request is filed, it will be listed in your pending withdrawals section. You can view it anytime to check the status of your withdrawal request.\n
Ensure that the details you provided are correct to avoid any delays in the processing of your withdrawal request.\n

string.name: bulleted_list3
string.li: For first-time withdrawals, we ask for your patience as it takes 15 days to clear your account before your request gets processed.

resources.string: You can only select one category.\n
For each correct Question you will be awarded 1 mark.\n

string.name: bulleted_list3_quiz
string.li: Result will be shown after you complete the Quiz.

resources.string: You might have not completed the task.\n
You might have completed the task via some other source.\n
Task might take some time to complete.(Please read task description.)\n
Share this code to your friends.\n
For each referral you will get 10 points and your friend will get 20 points.\n
Relax. We will automatically validate OTP.
